entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023
